person.content:
Please identify the "Person" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: At the ministerial meeting , trade ministers will review the work of the WTO and the implementation of the Uruguay Round free trade commitments under its predecessor the General Agreement on Tariffs and Trade ( GATT ) .

Let's think step by step.

1. Ministers: This is a group of people, but we can identify "ministers" as a collective entity of individuals holding ministerial positions.
2. Trade ministers: This is a more specific group of individuals within the larger group of ministers, who hold trade-related positions.
3. The ministers (at the ministerial meeting): This refers to the same group of individuals mentioned earlier, but in a different context.
4. WTO: The World Trade Organization is not a person, but an international organization.
5. Trade ministers (will review): This refers back to the group of trade ministers mentioned earlier.
6. The WTO (and the implementation of the Uruguay Round free trade commitments): The WTO is an organization, but the implementation of the Uruguay Round free trade commitments is an action being taken by the trade ministers.
7. The ministers (will review the work of): This refers back to the group of trade ministers mentioned earlier.
8. The WTO: This is the same organization mentioned earlier.
9. The Uruguay Round: This is a specific round of international trade negotiations, not a person.
10. The General Agreement on Tariffs and Trade (GATT): This is an international agreement, not a person.
11. Its predecessor: This refers to the General Agreement on Tariffs and Trade (GATT) mentioned earlier.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Person.

1. Trade ministers
2. Ministers (at the ministerial meeting)
3. WTO (implicitly refers to its members, the governments and their representatives)

So, the relevant person entities in the paragraph are "trade ministers" and "WTO (and its members)".

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Person |
|--------|
| trade ministers |
| Ministers (at the ministerial meeting) |
| WTO (and its members) |

location.content:
Please identify the "Location" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: At the ministerial meeting , trade ministers will review the work of the WTO and the implementation of the Uruguay Round free trade commitments under its predecessor the General Agreement on Tariffs and Trade ( GATT ) .

Let's think step by step.

1. Ministerial meeting: This is a location where the event is taking place.
2. WTO (World Trade Organization): This is an organization, but it can also be considered a location as it is the place where the international trade rules and agreements are set and enforced.
3. The Uruguay Round: This is a specific round of negotiations under the WTO, but it doesn't have a physical location.
4. The General Agreement on Tariffs and Trade (GATT): This is an agreement under the WTO, but it doesn't have a physical location.

So, the "Location" entities in the paragraph are:
1. Ministerial meeting
2. WTO
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Location.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Location".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

organization.content:
Please identify the "Organization" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: At the ministerial meeting , trade ministers will review the work of the WTO and the implementation of the Uruguay Round free trade commitments under its predecessor the General Agreement on Tariffs and Trade ( GATT ) .

Let's think step by step.

1. Ministerial Meeting: This is an event organized by the World Trade Organization (WTO).
2. WTO: World Trade Organization - an international organization that deals with the global rules of trade between nations.
3. Trade Ministers: These are ministers from various countries who are responsible for trade-related matters in their respective governments.
4. GATT: General Agreement on Tariffs and Trade - an international treaty, now part of the WTO, that was established to promote free trade and reduce tariffs and other trade barriers among its member states.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Organization.

1. WTO (World Trade Organization)
2. GATT (General Agreement on Tariffs and Trade)

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Organization".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Organization |
| --- |
| World Trade Organization (WTO) |
| General Agreement on Tariffs and Trade (GATT) |
